text: Rock Demers, (December 11, 1933 – August 17, 2021) was a Canadian movie producer. He was the founder of the movie company Les Productions la Fête and produced the Tales for All movie series for children. He also produced The Dog Who Stopped the War, The Peanut Butter Solution and Vincent and Me. Demers was born in Sainte-Cécile-de-Lévrard, Quebec. Demers died on August 17, 2021 at a Montreal hospital of heart failure, aged 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Canadian movie producers Category:People from Montreal
title: Rock Demers
